Sales Bulletin | July 24, 2018
Thank you for being a valued customer. Here are this week's Sales Bulletins:
Dealer Sales Bulletins:
Promotional Pricing for MST 70B Transponder BendixKing is pleased to offer a price discount for the MST 70B ADS-B Out upgrade for business jets equipped with the MST 67A transponder with Dealer Bulletin 2018BK-14 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2018BK-14 Promotional Pricing for MST 70B Transponder.pdf]]>.
CNI 5000 ADS-B Out Upgrade Joining CitationJet models 525 & 525A, BendixKing is pleased to add the Citation Bravo (model 550) to the CNI 5000 ADS-B upgrade program with Dealer Bulletin 2018BK-15.
Operator Bulletins:
AeroWave 100 Satellite Internet System Promotion BendixKing is pleased to offer an end user rebate promotion for the AeroWave 100 system with Operator Bulletin 2018BK_O_13 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2018BK_O_13 Promotion for the AeroWave 100 Satellite Internet System.pdf]]>.
CNI 5000 ADS-B Out UpgradeJoining CitationJet models 525 & 525A, BendixKing is pleased to add the Citation Bravo (model 550) to the CNI 5000 ADS-B upgrade program with Operator Bulletin 2018BK_O_15.
The complete list of 2018 Sales Bulletins is available at MyAerospace/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/parts-and-repairs/downloads/sales-bulletins#sort=%40fdisplayname2077%20descending]]>. Dealers must log in to view these bulletins.
Find your nearest BendixKing Area Sales Manager by visiting our website: https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team]]>.
